MetaDate.title: StonePlus - Concrete Design
MetaDate.description: A company specializing in Cement Products, Pool Edges, Coatings, and Natural Stones.

NotFound.description: Oops! The page <guidelines>{currentUrl}</guidelines> does not exist. Check the URL or go back to the homepage.

Hero.title: Turning houses into homes.
Hero.description: Refresh your spaces with our unique selection. Our items bring beauty, function, and style, showcasing your distinct personality.

Mission.title: Our commitment is to excellence and integrity.
Mission.description: At StonePlus, we strive to lead the market by offering excellence in service and promoting an ethical, inclusive environment for our employees to grow and develop.
Mission.vision-description: To be recognized as a leader in innovation and quality, setting new standards of excellence and contributing to a sustainable and prosperous future.
Mission.mission-description: Deliver solutions that exceed expectations, fostering innovation and continuous improvement, with a firm commitment to ethics and social responsibility.
Mission.values-description: Promote integrity and transparency in all actions. Pursue constant excellence and innovation. Foster an inclusive and respectful environment, with a commitment to sustainability.

requestQuote.title: How do I request a quote?
requestQuote.description: For businesses, please contact our corporate sales team for a personalized quote. End customers can request quotes directly through our website or by phone.

shippingBrazil.title: Do you ship to all of Brazil?
shippingBrazil.description: Yes, we serve all regions of Brazil, with logistics partners to ensure your order arrives safely and on time.

deliveryTime.title: What is the delivery time?
deliveryTime.description: Delivery time may vary depending on the type of product and the quantity ordered. Typically, we deliver within 10 business days for end customers.

sampleRequest.title: Can I request samples of coatings?
sampleRequest.description: Yes, we provide samples so you can evaluate the quality and appearance of our products before making a purchase.

bulkOrders.title: Do you offer special conditions for large orders?
bulkOrders.description: Yes! For construction companies, architects, or resellers, we offer special pricing and conditions for bulk orders.

warranty.title: Do the coatings come with a warranty?
warranty.description: Yes, all of our coatings come with a warranty against manufacturing defects. Warranty details are available on each product page.

paymentOptions.title: What are the payment options?
paymentOptions.description: We accept credit cards, bank transfers, and, for businesses, we offer billing subject to credit analysis.

Footer.AboutUs: We are a company that stands out in the market for elegance, durability, and functionality. We always aim to provide customized solutions according to our clients' specifications.
